items.title: Rates say slowdown. Equities say party.
items.deck: 10y UST < 4%. Tech still euphoric. One of them is lying.
items.html: Bond market is quietly screaming "growth is fading". Stocks are still in 'soft landing forever' mode. This is the tension.

items.title: A 6×6 thought: why sum=7 feels special
items.deck: On two dice, the middle sum gets the most paths. Try highlighting the diagonal.
items.html: Count pairs, not magic. The six ways to make 7 line up as a diagonal in the 6×6 grid.

items.title: Kelly’s whisper
items.deck: If your edge is p, the sweet spot is roughly f = 2p − 1. Too big kills you.
items.html: Play first in the lab, then open the derivation. $g(f)=p\ln(1+f)+(1-p)\ln(1-f)$ peaks at $2p-1$.

items.title: Gamma flips near zero
items.deck: Binary curve notes: OTM stabilizes, ITM amplifies. Watch the $K=0$ line.
items.html: Replacement flows (receive 30y / pay 10y) lean on the spread when stress rises.
